WARNING!

Redactor have some changes from source version!
Save this changes when update redactor.

This changes fixes bug with appearing junk span tags and style attributes when paste text and adding some elements.

Find changes with diff. Or just follow the list:

- new 2942 line in 'exec' method: `if (cmd === 'inserthtml') { this.insertHtmlAdvanced(param, false); }`
- change 2943 line in 'exec' method: `else { this.document.execCommand(cmd, false, param); }`
- change 4558 line in 'insertHtml' method: `if ($html.contents().length > 1 && currBlock && false`
- change 4559 line in 'insertHtml' method: `|| $html.contents().is('p, :header, ul, ol, li, div, table, td, blockquote, pre, address, section, header, footer, aside, article') && false)`
- comment line 4662 in 'insertText' method: `// else this.document.execCommand('inserthtml', false, html);`
- new 4663 line in 'insertText' method: `else this.insertHtmlAdvanced(html, false);`
- comment line 1046 in 'buildStart' method: `this.$box.css('z-index', this.opts.zIndexMax - this.uuid);`
